body: Hi Iason, I'm not sure if this file is generate with the same script as [this discussion](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topic/show?id=2985220%3ATopic%3A1461310&xg_source=msg) but if that is the case your input is set to 0.
